title: Bug 7330: Make more actions available on text selection
description: Bug 7330: Make more actions available on text selection. I could not find the action "Add Javadoc Comment" until I switched to the Outline view. Currently, the actions seem to be distributed based on personal preference, which should be changed. It is unclear to users why some actions are in the context menu and some are not. It is not acceptable to force users to switch the view to access certain actions in the editor.
OB: When I right-clicked on the selected text, the action "Add Javadoc Comment" was not available in the context menu.
EB: The action "Add Javadoc Comment" should be visible in the context menu when right-clicking on selected text.
SR:
Here are the steps to reproduce the issue:
1. Open the editor.
2. Select some text.
3. Right-click on the selected text.
4. Verify that the action "Add Javadoc Comment" is not available in the context menu.
